name: @beamcloud/beam-js
description: Javascript SDK to interact with Beam
author: John <john@slai.io>

scripts.build: tsc-multi && node ./scripts/make-dist-package-json.cjs > dist/package.json && cp README.md dist/README.md && cp LICENSE dist/LICENSE
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo 'to publish, run yarn build && (cd dist; yarn publish)' && exit 1
